    //Method will parse JSONObject and return a List<Address> containing one Address.
    //The Address will only contain data for county, state and country.
    public static List<Address> parseJSONAddressList(JSONObject jsonObject) {

        String addressData;
        Address address = null;

        List<Address> result = new ArrayList<Address>();

        if (jsonObject != null) {
            try {
                //get and iterate through the results array
                JSONArray results = jsonObject.getJSONArray("results");

                    JSONObject resultIndexes = results.getJSONObject(0);
                    //get the addressComponents array
                    if (resultIndexes != null) {
                        JSONArray addressComponenents = resultIndexes.getJSONArray("address_components");

                        //iterates through the address components
                        for (int x = 0; x < addressComponenents.length(); x++) {
                            address = new Address(Locale.getDefault());

                            JSONObject addressComponenentIndexes = addressComponenents.getJSONObject(x);
                            if (addressComponenentIndexes != null) {
                                JSONArray types = addressComponenentIndexes.getJSONArray("types");

                                //get the address data
                                addressData = addressComponenentIndexes.getString("long_name");

                                //get and iterate through the types array
                                if (types.getString(0) != null) {

                                    if (types.getString(0).equals("administrative_area_level_2")) {
                                        address.setSubAdminArea(addressData);
                                    } else if (types.getString(0).equals("administrative_area_level_1")) {
                                        address.setAdminArea(addressData);
                                    } else if (types.getString(0).equals("country")) {
                                        address.setCountryName(addressData);
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            if (address.getSubAdminArea() != null &&
                                    address.getAdminArea() != null &&
                                    address.getCountryName() != null) {
                                result.add(address);
                                return result;
                            }
                        }
                    }
            } catch (JSONException e) {
                Log.e("MyGeocoder", "parseAdrressJSONList JSONException e = " + e.getMessage());
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        return null;
    }
